function.description: Retrieves a variable from the global JMVC scope

params.param: the name of the new variable to be retrieved
meant to be localStorage or sessionStorage

function.returns: the variable reference or value if found, or undefined
function.code: JMVC.set('a', 10);JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a'));JMVC.del('a');JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a'));JMVC.set('a', 11, localStorage);JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a', localStorage));JMVC.del('a', localStorage);JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a', localStorage));JMVC.set('a', 12, sessionStorage);JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a', sessionStorage));JMVC.del('a', sessionStorage);JMVC.debug(JMVC.get('a', sessionStorage));
